DataElement.preferredName: Prior RT Systemic Radiopharmaceutical Compound Administered Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to prior systemic radiation therapy administered using a radiopharmaceutical compound.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior RT Systemic Radiopharmaceutical Compound Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to prior systemic RT administered using a radiopharmaceutical compound (agents that contain a radioactive isotope and are used for diagnostic or therapeutic purposes that affect the entire body).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: (sis-TEM-ik) Affecting the entire body.:Drugs containing a radioactive substance that are used in the diagnosis and treatment of cancer and in pain management of bone metastases.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: An agent that contains a radioactive isotope and is used for diagnostic or therapeutic purposes.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: At least 8 weeks of prior "sy
ReferenceDocuments.description: At least 8 weeks of prior "systemic" radiopharmaceuticals (strontium, samarium).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CITN
ReferenceDocuments.description: At least 8 weeks from prior "systemic" radiopharmaceuticals (strontium, samarium, radium 223 dichloride ).
